headline: How Will Morgan Stanley’s Upgrade and Leadership Changes Impact PG&E’s (PCG) Investment Narrative?
summary: Earlier this week, Morgan Stanley upgraded PG&E Corporation’s rating, attributing the change to improved wildfire risk management and a more favorable investment outlook, while the company also affirmed its regular quarterly dividend and appointed Alejandro Vallejo as Chief People Officer effective September 30. An interesting insight is that the recent completion of the Calistoga Resiliency Center, a hybrid microgrid facility, highlights PG&E’s efforts to enhance grid reliability and...
